Class Subject

net.tangly.core.EntityImp

net.tangly.erp.crm.domain.Subject
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.tangly.core.Entity, net.tangly.core.HasComments, net.tangly.core.HasId, net.tangly.core.HasName, net.tangly.core.HasOid, net.tangly.core.HasTags, net.tangly.core.HasText, net.tangly.core.HasTimeInterval, net.tangly.core.NamedEntity, net.tangly.core.QualifiedEntity
public class Subject extends net.tangly.core.QualifiedEntityImp
Defines the abstraction of a registered subject entitled to use the application and associated services. The id of the subject is the human readable unique identifier.
